arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe's Reaction When Asked About Horror Challenge on Him vs Espanyol
arts.sum: Mbappe was not best pleased with referee Alejandro Muniz Ruiz's decision to let Carlos Romero, the eventual goalscorer, walk away with a yellow.

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Espanyol 1-0 Real Madrid; 2025 La Liga
arts.sum: Lucas Vazquez—6 : Got up and down the flank, providing three key passes. Raul Asencio—7: Composed and confident playing left center-back for most of the match.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti lets rip at referee after Real Madrid controversy - 'Inexplicable'
arts.sum: Real Madrid missed a chance to extend their lead at the top of La Liga on Saturday but manager Carlo Ancelotti took aim at the referee after a painful defeat to Espanyol

arts.ttl: Managing Madrid Podcast: Espanyol 1 - 0 Real Madrid, Post-game, La Liga 2024 - 2025
arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani and Matt Wiltse discuss: It also serves as a means for Real Madrid fans to connect and discuss the team.

arts.ttl: Carlos Romero hits late winner as Espanyol stun Real Madrid
arts.sum: The left-back converted at the far post in the closing stages as Espanyol consigned Carlo Ancelotti’s side to a third league defeat of the season.

arts.ttl: “Filthy Negreira league” – Real Madrid TV slam referee decision in Espanyol loss
arts.sum: On Saturday, Real Madrid suffered their first La Liga loss of 2025 as they fell to a 1-0 defeat against Espanyol at the Stage Front Stadium. However, the manner of the defeat was controversial, with the league leaders furious with the decision not to send off Carlos Romero, who went on to score the winning […] The post “Filthy Negreira league” – Real Madrid TV slam referee decision in Espanyol loss appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Madrid's profligacy punished as Espanyol grab win
arts.sum: LaLiga leaders Real Madrid were stunned at lowly Espanyol on Saturday after losing 1-0 thanks to a late Carlos Romero strike.

arts.ttl: ‘The whole world saw it’ – Carlo Ancelotti fumes over refereeing in Real Madrid’s Espanyol defeat
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has provided his take on the controversial officiating which ultimately cost his side dear on Saturday night. Real Madrid are of course fresh off…

arts.ttl: Watch: Arda Güler’s angry reaction to Espanyol’s winner vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: Footage of Real Madrid star Arda Güler reacting to the decisive goal in his side’s meeting with Espanyol has come to the fore online. Real Madrid were of course back…

arts.ttl: Espanyol 1-0 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as underwhelming Los Blancos are stunned in Catalonia
arts.sum: Carlos Romero scores the only goal of the match as Espanyol record a shock 1-0 victory over Real Madrid in Saturday night's La Liga contest in Catalonia.
